news.title: Justia Ask A Lawyer by the Numbers: Third Quarter 2023
news.description: Ready for another edition of Justia Ask A Lawyer by the numbers? We pulled the data from the third quarter of 2023 and are back to share some usage insights and statistics with all of you!

news.title: Justia Legal Resources: Banking and Finance Law Center
news.description: Buying securities or taking out a loan can be intimidating, but consumers have recourse against misconduct by financial professionals or institutions. The Banking and Finance Law Center at Justia explains some of the key rules in this area.

news.title: Explore the Crossroads of Legal and Business Ethics in the AI Era
news.description: In an era dominated by continuously changing technology, artificial intelligence has made a splash as the latest wave of change. With this change, professionals in various industries face new ethical considerations. Join Justia Webinars for a fascinating program exploring the intersection of legal and business ethics in an evolving AI landscape.
